item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Welcome to the official blog of the Cambridge Branch of the Communist Party of Britain. We are a group of Marxist-Leninist activists fighting for a socialist Britain. This blog aims to be a collection of writings from our branch members (with the potential to include guest writers) on current British and international politics from a far-left and anti-imperialist perspective.

We hope that you find this blog to be informative and stimulating. If you have any questions or comments, please get in touch via e-mail, Facebook or Twitter, or come along to one of our branch meetings, which are held at 1930 on the first Friday of every month, at the Memorial (Unitarian) Church, Emmanuel Road, Cambridge.

Workers of all countries, unite! ☭

item.title: About Us
item.description:
We are the Cambridge Branch of the Communist Party of Britain, the UK’s largest Marxist-Leninist party.

We fight for the construction of a socialist, federal British republic, following our party programme, Britain’s Road to Socialism.

Our branch meets at 1930 on the first Friday of every month, at the Memorial (Unitarian) Church, Emmanuel Road, Cambridge.

For more information, contact us at info@cambridgecommunist.party.

Comments policy

Comments are welcomed as a healthy and crucial part of critical discourse. Moderation occurs on a case-by-case basis at the editor’s discretion.

Disclaimer

Publication of information does not imply endorsement or affiliation on the part of the CPB Cambridge Branch. The opinions expressed in posts here are those of their respective authors, not of the editors, nor of the Branch.
